name: NHentai Downloader
tagline: Archive NHentai doujinshi for private offline reading.
description:
NHentai Downloader lets collectors save doujinshi they are permitted to view, complete with page order and metadata. Skip page-by-page saving and keep your library ready for offline reading.

Use it to organize research references, preserve favorite works on your tablet, or keep backups when traveling without stable internet.

faqs.question: How do I download a doujinshi?
faqs.answer: Enter the NHentai code or open the gallery, then start the download to save all pages in order.

faqs.question: Does it bypass restricted content?
faqs.answer: No. You must already have permission to view the gallery according to NHentai policies.

faqs.question: Can I export tags?
faqs.answer: Yes. Metadata such as artists, characters, and tags are included in a companion JSON file for cataloging.

faqs.question: Are downloads compressed?
faqs.answer: Files are stored in their original resolution and packaged into a folder so you can open them in any reader.

faqs.question: Is usage tracked?
faqs.answer: No. The app runs locally; we do not monitor which galleries you download.
